meanings.definition: To make urban or sophisticated in character.
meanings.sent1: The small town was citified when they built a new shopping mall.
meanings.sent2: She citified her wardrobe by adding trendy accessories.
meanings.sent3: The farm animals citified themselves by wearing sunglasses and hats.
meanings.sent4: The old building was citified with modern architecture and glass walls.
meanings.sent5: The once rustic cafe was citified with chic decor and fancy lighting.

meanings.definition: Having the manners or customs of a city dweller.
meanings.sent1: The citified gentleman always wore a suit and tie.
meanings.sent2: Her citified behavior stood out in the small town.
meanings.sent3: The citified cat demanded only imported cat food.
meanings.sent4: The citified dog refused to walk on grass and only used sidewalks.
meanings.sent5: The citified couple spoke with refined accents and dined at upscale restaurants.
